Play Well a Local Sports Initiative with Pacific Epping

Discover how to get into sport!
Everyone deserves a place in sport, which is why, in partnership with the Australian Sports Commission, Pacific Epping is giving away a $100 gift card each week to help you get involved—whether as a volunteer, coach, official or participant. Discover local sports clubs, community initiatives, and more!
Win a $100 Gift Card to Help You Get in the Game!
To inspire your journey in sport, we’re giving away weekly gift cards to help you reach your goals! T&C’s apply.
Enter now

Whether it’s signing up with a local club, volunteering, or coaching, there’s a role for everyone!

We acknowledge and respect the traditional lands and cultures of the Wurundjeri people of the Kulin Nation, the Traditional Owners and Custodians of the Country on which Pacific Epping resides, and pay our respects to Elders past and present. We recognise First Nations peoples’ longstanding and ongoing spiritual connections to land, sea, community, and country.
